### Column

Form column.

#### Props

| 属性名         | 类型                                | 默认值 | 说明                     |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------ | ------------------------ |
| prop1          | string                              | "red"  | prop1 description        |
| prop2 _(必填)_ | number                              |        | prop2 description        |
| prop3 _(必填)_ | () => void                          |        | prop3 description a \| b |
| prop4 _(必填)_ | "option1" \| "option2" \| "option3" |        | prop4 description 中文   |
